jd: From: Mohan Vaka, Kollasoft, Inc mohan@kollasoft.com Reply to: mohan@kollasoft.com Client: E-commerce company ONLY CANDIDATES LOCAL TO ILLINOIS OR WISCONSIN!!! H1B, GC, USC 100% ON SITE ROLE THIS IS A SENIOR ROLE: NO OPTs/CPTs! W2 or 1099 preferred, But C2C also works 12+ years of experience in IT 5+ years of experience in DataStax/Cassandra is a MUST! 2 MS Teams Interviews (1 interview may be on site, that’s why we need local candidates!) EXCELLENT VERBAL AND WRITTEN COMMUNICATION SKILLS!!! DATASTAX/CASSANDRA DBA POSITION’S QUALIFICATIONS: • Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field. • 12+ years of experience in IT • 5+ years of experience in Database Management/Data Integration. • Proficient in one or more Database Management Systems (e.g. DB2i, DB2 LUW, DataStax, Oracle, SQL Server). • Familiar with one or more replication technologies (e.g. DTShare, CDC, SQL Replication, Attunity). • Ability to read a Logical Data Model a plus. • Excellent verbal and written communication skills. • Detail oriented. Can juggle multiple priorities. • Strong analytical, problem-solving ability. • May require travel to branch locations. • Regular and reliable attendance. • Certifications are a PLUS.
